alert.note: Alert for Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 10 at 2:05PM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 10 inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 5 PM MST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
